verses.text: \w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w finished|strong="G5055"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* left \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w region|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*.

\w Large|strong="G4183"\w* \w crowds|strong="G3793"\w* followed \w Him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G1438"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Have|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* read \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* beginning \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Creator|strong="G2936"\w* ‘\w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* male \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w female|strong="G2338"\w*,’\f + \fr 19:4 \ft Genesis 1:27; Genesis 5:2\f*

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w reason|strong="G1752"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w leave|strong="G2641"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* united \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w become|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*’\f + \fr 19:5 \ft Genesis 2:24 (see also LXX)\f*?

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w longer|strong="G3765"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w joined|strong="G4801"\w* \w together|strong="G4801"\w*, \w let|strong="G5563"\w* \w man|strong="G1520"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w separate|strong="G5563"\w*.”

“\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*,” \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* order \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5101"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* wife \w a|strong="G2532"\w* certificate \w of|strong="G2532"\w* divorce \w and|strong="G2532"\w* send \w her|strong="G1325"\w* away?\f + \fr 19:7 \ft See Deuteronomy 24:1.\f*”

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w whoever|strong="G3739"\w* divorces \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w sexual|strong="G4202"\w* \w immorality|strong="G4202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marries|strong="G1060"\w* \w another|strong="G3739"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w commits|strong="G3429"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3429"\w*.\f + \fr 19:9 \ft SBL and BYZ include And he who marries a divorced woman commits adultery; see Matthew 5:32.\f*”

\w His|strong="G3326"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w case|strong="G3588"\w* \w between|strong="G3326"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w* \w and|strong="G1135"\w* \w his|strong="G3326"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w it|strong="G1487"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w better|strong="G4851"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*.”

“\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w accept|strong="G5562"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*,” \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w only|strong="G3756"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w been|strong="G1325"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* little \w children|strong="G3813"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w place|strong="G2007"\w* \w His|strong="G2007"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G5495"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

The Rich Young Man (Mark 10:17–31; Luke 18:18–30)

“\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G5101"\w*?”\f + \fr 19:17 \ft BYZ and TR 16...“Good Teacher, what good thing must I do to obtain eternal life?” 17 “Why do you call Me good?” See Mark 10:17–18 and Luke 18:18–19.\f* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w only|strong="G1487"\w* \w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G5101"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*.”

“\w Which|strong="G3588"\w* \w ones|strong="G4169"\w*?” \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, “‘\w Do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w murder|strong="G5407"\w*, \w do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, \w do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w bear|strong="G5576"\w* \w false|strong="G5576"\w* \w witness|strong="G5576"\w*,

\w honor|strong="G5091"\w* \w your|strong="G5091"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* love \w your|strong="G5091"\w* \w neighbor|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w yourself|strong="G4572"\w*.’\f + \fr 19:19 \ft Exodus 20:12–16; Leviticus 19:18; Deuteronomy 5:16–20\f*”

“\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w kept|strong="G5442"\w*,” \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*. “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w* \w lack|strong="G5302"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* told \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w*, \w go|strong="G5217"\w*, \w sell|strong="G4453"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w possessions|strong="G5225"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w treasure|strong="G2344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*. \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1204"\w*, follow \w Me|strong="G1325"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3495"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w went|strong="G3588"\w* away \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3076"\w*, \w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* wealth.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4970"\w* \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w be|strong="G1410"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w looked|strong="G1689"\w* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w With|strong="G3844"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* impossible, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w possible|strong="G1415"\w*.”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Truly|strong="G1909"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* renewal \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w*,\f + \fr 19:28 \ft Or in the regeneration\f* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Man|strong="G5207"\w* \w sits|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w His|strong="G1909"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* followed \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thrones|strong="G2362"\w*, \w judging|strong="G2919"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w tribes|strong="G5443"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.
